Name: Call Of The Mighty Warriors
About the game: From the genre of Tower Defense, in this game you will battle as an mercenary, hired by one of the kingdoms in war, the king demand you to command the mercenaries and defend strategic points with your experience on the battlefield in extremely dangerous places. Place different towers around each level, your strategy can turn you into a hero of the kingdom. Lots of levels in extreme places of the planet are awaiting for you, in each level you will encounter different terrains which will test your skills against the enemies of the kingdom. About the Gameplay Each level will be more difficult. Soldiers will appear often and outnumber. The more you progress on the levels, more different will need to be your strategy to win. Some levels will be longer than others.
